mapper.insert: INSERT INTO order_list ( ord_cd, cp_cd, ord_dt, note, deli_req_dt, deli_add, ex_pay_dt, ord_total_amount, regi, reg_dt, ord_status_internal, ord_status_customer, is_used ) VALUES ( #{ordCd}, #{cpCd}, #{ordDt}, #{note}, #{deliReqDt}, #{deliAdd}, #{exPayDt}, #{ordTotalAmount}, #{regi}, SYSDATE, #{ordStatusInternal}, #{ordStatusCustomer}, #{isUsed} )

INSERT INTO order_d ( ord_d_cd, ord_cd, pcode, prod_ver_cd, ord_qty, deli_avail_dt, unit_price, ord_d_status, is_used ) VALUES ( #{ordDCd}, #{ordCd}, #{pcode}, #{prodVerCd}, #{ordQty}, #{deliAvailDt}, #{unitPrice}, #{ordDStatus}, #{isUsed} )
mapper.select: SELECT MAX(ord_cd) FROM order_list WHERE SUBSTR(ord_cd, 5, 4) = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY')

SELECT ord_cd AS ordCd, cp_cd AS cpCd, cp_name AS cpName, prod_name AS prodName, total_ord_qty AS totalQty, total_return_qty AS returnQty, total_amount AS totalAmount, ord_dt AS ordDt, deli_req_dt AS deliReqDt, note, ord_status_internal AS ordStatusInternal, ord_status_customer AS ordStatusCustomer FROM vw_order_list WHERE is_used = 'f1'
AND ord_cd LIKE '%' || #{ordCd} || '%'
AND TRUNC(ord_dt) >= TO_DATE(#{ordDtStart}, 'YYYY-MM-DD')
AND TRUNC(ord_dt) <= TO_DATE(#{ordDtEnd}, 'YYYY-MM-DD')
AND TRUNC(deli_req_dt) >= TO_DATE(#{deliReqDtStart}, 'YYYY-MM-DD')
AND TRUNC(deli_req_dt) <= TO_DATE(#{deliReqDtEnd}, 'YYYY-MM-DD')
AND ord_status_internal = #{ordStatusInternal}
AND ord_status_customer = #{ordStatusCustomer}
AND cp_name LIKE '%' || #{cpName} || '%'
AND cp_cd = #{cpCd}
ORDER BY ord_cd DESC

SELECT o.ord_cd AS ordCd, o.cp_cd AS cpCd, c.cp_name AS cpName, c.unsettled_amount AS unsettledAmount, o.ord_dt AS ordDt, o.note, o.deli_req_dt AS deliReqDt, o.ord_status_internal AS ordStatusInternal, o.ord_status_customer AS ordStatusCustomer, o.deli_add AS deliAdd, o.regi, o.reg_dt AS regDt, o.ord_total_amount AS ordTotalAmount, o.cur_pay_amount AS curPayAmount, o.ex_pay_dt AS exPayDt, o.act_pay_dt AS actPayDt, o.is_used AS isUsed FROM order_list o JOIN company c ON o.cp_cd = c.cp_cd WHERE o.ord_cd = #{ordCd}

SELECT od.ord_d_cd AS ordDCd, od.ord_cd AS ordCd, od.pcode, p.prod_name AS prodName, od.prod_ver_cd AS prodVerCd, od.ord_qty AS ordQty, od.unit_price AS unitPrice, od.deli_avail_dt AS deliAvailDt, od.ord_d_status AS ordDStatus, (od.ord_qty * od.unit_price) AS totalAmount, od.is_used AS isUsed FROM order_d od JOIN product p ON od.pcode = p.pcode WHERE od.ord_cd = #{ordCd}
mapper.update: UPDATE order_list SET ord_dt = #{ordDt}, deli_req_dt = #{deliReqDt}, ex_pay_dt = #{exPayDt}, deli_add = #{deliAdd}, note = #{note}, ord_total_amount = #{ordTotalAmount}, ord_status_internal = #{ordStatusInternal}, ord_status_customer = #{ordStatusCustomer} WHERE ord_cd = #{ordCd}

UPDATE order_d SET pcode = #{pcode}, prod_ver_cd = #{prodVerCd}, ord_qty = #{ordQty}, unit_price = #{unitPrice}, deli_avail_dt = #{deliAvailDt}, ord_d_status = #{ordDStatus}, is_used = #{isUsed} WHERE ord_d_cd = #{ordDCd}
